attributes.action: If a yes vote then Scotish Members of Westminster should have no influence on negotiations or any effect on a UK Election
attributes.additional_details: In the event of a 'Yes' to independence from the people of Scotland. The Scottish Members in both Houses of Parliament should have no influence on UK negotiations with independent Scotland. In addition the Scotland Office must be dissolved or re-tasked as its stated purpose is to look after Scotland.

rejection.details:
Please see:

Petition Title: If Scotland votes Yes to independence Scottish MPs should be withdrawn from the UK Parliament by no later than the May 2015 General Election.

Created by: Antony Brown

Closing: 10/12/2014
